name: Fatal Leap
description:
Developers:

The year is 1724, and Japan is growing. Cities are being built to this day, the Samurai in training for the future military, life seems simple. The supernatural is taking place here as well. It is a threat to the government and they are afraid that these users will come to be more of a threat in their future. To keep the peace, the Samurai have been tasked to kill all people that practice magic. No one should be left alive. The Samurai scatter in search, killing citizens, ending magic for good. One family, in a distant farm land, tends to the fields, at least on the outside. Hiding from the Samurai. This family practices magic, no one has disturbed them for many years. This family is called the Rujan family. They make close connections with the snakes and even have them as a personal pet. One member, is the youngest of the family. She trains constantly with her magic and is getting closer and closer to becoming an official member of her family. It has been many years, training constantly for what’s to come. Her grandmother always tells her, “Be ready, because when the time comes you will need your strength, your agility, your magic, to make it out alive.” From this advice she begins to train, learning her magic to do crazy acts. Running against a wall with her magic, vanishing in her run to only come back seconds afterward, she is growing stronger every day.

Fatal Leap is a third person action parkour game set in a fantasy universe. Race against the clock as you play as Aya Rujan. traverses across 2 unique courses to help hone her skills and fight against the powers that be.
